title: Kim Kardashian feels 'so blessed' after being baptised with her kids
text:
Kim Kardashian feels 'so blessed' after being baptised with her kids

Cape Town – During her recent trip to Armenia Kim Kardashian West was baptised alongside her 'babies'.

The 38-year-old and her three youngest children Saint (3), Chicago (20 months) and Psalm (5 months) were baptised at the Mother See of Holy Etchmiadzin cathedral.

It is not clear whether her eldest North (6) participated in the ceremony. She was previously baptised in Jerusalem in 2015.

READ MORE: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West have North baptised in Jerusalem

While her husband Kanye West wasn't there PEOPLE reports that Kourtney Kardashian and her children attended the ceremony held on Monday morning.

Kim shared pictures from the religious ceremony on Instagram.

She wrote: "Thank you, Armenia, for such a memorable trip. So blessed to have been baptised along with my babies at Mother See of Holy Etchmiadzin, Armenia's main cathedral which is sometimes referred to as the Vatican of the Armenian Apostolic Church."

SEE THE PICS HERE:

The sisters also had dinner with the President of Armenia and his family during their visit to the country.

E! News reports they stayed for two hours and had a six-course meal.

Compiled by Leandra Engelbrecht. (Sources: PEOPLE, E! News, Instagram)
description: During a recent trip to Armenia Kim Kardashian West was baptised alongside her 'babies'.
